name: SteamPunks (Multiplayer)
description:
SteamPunks is an assassin type game where you are given a target of another player. All players have targets so it's everyone's goal to find their target and eliminate them while also trying to avoid your assassin.

Gameplay details:

- press 1 to wield a knife

- Left mouse button uses a knife

- When a player holds their knife out they are then killable by anyone in the server for a certain period of time.

- Killing too many NPC's or trying to stab a player that isn't your target will result in eventually your death (You're allowed 3 mis-hits)

- Once there is only one assassin remaining they are the victor.
